system.description: When you share a moment of intimacy—physical or emotional— with someone new who isn’t mortal, mark corruption. When you @UUID[Compendium.urban-shadows-pbta.play-materials.Item.Ku9fM1rN5sO8tP4q]{figure out someone} you’ve previously shared a moment of intimacy with, roll with HEART instead of MIND.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value:
The MC tells you what interesting thing happens.

If you're in their Circle, ask an additional question, even on a miss.

weak-hit.label: Weak Hit
weak-hit.value: On a hit, ask two. On a 7-9, they ask one of you as well. If you're in their Circle, ask an additional question.

strong-hit.label: Strong Hit
strong-hit.value: On a hit, ask two. If you're in their Circle, ask an additional question.

system.choices:
• who's pulling your character's strings?
  • what's your character's beef with _____?
  • what's your character hoping to get from _____?
  • what does your character worry is going to happen?
  • how could I get your character to _____?
  • how could I put your character in my Debt?
